content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the privacy of the customer’s payment information?

choices.label: It is considered private because retrieving it requires a password.
It is considered private because the value of the instance variable  cName  is not easy to guess.
It is not considered private because the instance variables are declared  public.
It is not considered private because the  getName  method has no password parameter.

content.answer: It is not considered private because the instance variables are declared  public.
